name: Great Syphon: Ship builder
description:
Great Syphon : Editor

goal: Box of toys to construct ships from composite parts

author: Afonin Vladimir
mailto: stormarchitextor@gmail.com

Usage:

0. Esc - exit from app
1. Drag with mouse ship parts on screen
2. Shift + mouse movement - move origin (green/blue circle) of rotation
3. F2 - save setup
4. F3 - load setup
5. A/D - rotate selected ship part
6. W/S - scale up/down selected ship part
7. Arrows - move selected ship part around
8. Ctrl + Arrow Up/Down, Q|E - move selected ship part z-order
9. R - reset rotation of selected ship part

10. T - reset scale of selected ship part
11. Click on ship part to select it
12. Click on background to deselect it
13. P - show template ship
14. [,] - scroll template ship
15. Ctrl + F8 - clear setup (all ship parts shuffled)
16. F8 - change background
17. I - invert ship part horizontally
18. U - invert ship part vertically

19. H - hide ship part

20. CTRL+F7 - show all ship parts

21. F7 - toggle ship part visibility
